Subject** ANTI-DOPING CONVENTION ** Amendments to Annex I and Annex II
PrecisOrder accepting that amendments to Annex I and Annex II of the INTERNATIONAL CONVENTION AGAINST DOPING IN SPORT be binding on Canada. The purpose of these amendments is to update the Prohibited List â€“ International Standard and the Standards for Granting Therapeutic Use Exemptions, both of which are annexed to the Convention.
